name: The First Descendant: Season 2
storyline: Season 2 Episode 2: Beyond The Void introduces the official continuation of the main story, following the destruction of the Ironheart in the Fortress region. Vulgus General Karel’s century-long scheme is finally unveiled, along with a secret weapon designed to shift the tide of war. In this chapter, Descendants encounter Serena, an early-generation Descendant sealed within the Sigma Sector, and join forces to confront this formidable threat. With powerful cinematic storytelling, this chapter deepens the relationships between Descendants and further enriches the lore, delivering an immersive and engaging narrative experience.
summary:
The First Descendant Releases Season 2 Episode 2 Update ‘Beyond The Void’

As Season 2's story expands, Descendants embark on missions in the newly introduced Sigma Sector—a once-unknown land concealed by the Void Storm. Following the destruction of the Iron Heart, the Descendants discover a crucial clue in this area while tracking Karel.

During their operations in Sigma Sector, Descendants uncover evidence of Vulgus' experiments on Arche holders. This episode also marks the significant reveal of Dia, the daughter of Gley, whose whereabouts had remained a mystery until now.

Additionally, the episode introduces Serena, one of the original Descendants who vanished 100 years ago. As Karel’s plans begin to unfold, a new enemy faction emerges—the Obliviant, a unit of Descendants who have fallen under Vulgus’ control.

With the introduction of Sigma Sector, new key characters (Dia and Serena), and the Obliviant, Episode 2 deepens the story of The First Descendant’s expanding universe.
